trans-unit.source: Wraps a reader that is pointing to enveloped signed XML to provide a reader that can be used to read the content without having to process the signature.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un lector que apunta a XML firmado envuelto para proporcionar un lector que se pueda usar para leer el contenido sin tener que procesar la signatura.

trans-unit.source: The signature is automatically validated when the last element of the envelope is read.
trans-unit.target: La signatura se valida automáticamente cuando se lee el último elemento del sobre.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" />.

trans-unit.source: A reader that is pointing to the enveloped signed XML.
trans-unit.target: Lector que señala al XML firmado con doble cifrado.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer to be used to deserialize the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: El serializador de token que se usará para deserializar <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> de la signatura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> class by using the specified reader and security token serializer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> usando el lector y el serializador de token de seguridad especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor is invoked with the following additional parameters:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> se invoca el constructor con parámetros adicionales siguientes:

trans-unit.source: Parameter Name
trans-unit.target: Nombre de parámetro

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A reader that is pointing to the enveloped signed XML.
trans-unit.target: Lector que señala al XML firmado con doble cifrado.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer to be used to deserialize the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: El serializador de token que se usará para deserializar <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> de la signatura.

trans-unit.source: The token resolver to be used to resolve the signing token.
trans-unit.target: La resolución de token que se usará para resolver el token de signatura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> specifies that a default security token resolver should be used.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> especifica que se debe utilizar una resolución del token de seguridad predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> class by using the specified reader, security token serializer, and token resolver.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> mediante el lector, serializador del token de seguridad y resolución de token especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor is invoked with the following additional parameters:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> se invoca el constructor con parámetros adicionales siguientes:

trans-unit.source: Parameter Name
trans-unit.target: Nombre de parámetro

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A reader that is pointing to the enveloped signed XML.
trans-unit.target: Lector que señala al XML firmado con doble cifrado.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer to be used to deserialize the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: El serializador de token que se usará para deserializar <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> de la signatura.

trans-unit.source: The token resolver to be used to resolve the signing token.
trans-unit.target: La resolución de token que se usará para resolver el token de signatura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> specifies that a default security token resolver should be used.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> especifica que se debe utilizar una resolución del token de seguridad predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la signatura es necesaria; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature should be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se debe leer la signatura; si no, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if intrinsic signing keys should be resolved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si las claves de firma intrínseca se deben resolver; si no, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> class by using the specified reader, security token serializer, token resolver, and behavior.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader" /> mediante el lector, serializador del token de seguridad y resolución de token y comportamiento especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenSerializer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Reads the next node from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Lee el siguiente nodo del flujo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the next node was read successfully; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more nodes.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se lee correctamente el siguiente nodo; es <see langword="false" /> si no hay más nodos.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the end of the envelope is reached and validates the signature if the `requireSignature` parameter was specified `true` in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si se alcanza el final de la envoltura y si valida la firma si el `requireSignature` se especificó un parámetro `true` en el constructor.

trans-unit.source: If the reader gets positioned on a `<Signature>` element, the whole signature is read in if the `automaticallyReadSignature` parameter was specified `true` in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Si obtiene el lector en un `<Signature>` elemento, se lee la firma completa en if el `automaticallyReadSignature` se especificó un parámetro `true` en el constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the signing credentials that are used in the signature, after the envelope is consumed and when the signature is validated.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene las credenciales de firma que se usan en la signatura, después de que se consume el sobre y cuando se valida la signatura.

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials.
trans-unit.target: Las credenciales de firma.

trans-unit.source: Reads the signature if the reader is currently positioned at a <see langword="<Signature>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Lee la signatura si el lector se encuentra actualmente en un elemento <see langword="<Signature>" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature was successfully read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la signatura se leyó correctamente; si no, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the reader is currently positioned on a `<Signature>` element, invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.Read%2A> method to read the signature.
trans-unit.target: Si el lector está situado actualmente un `<Signature>` elemento, se invoca el <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureReader.Read%2A> método para leer la firma.
